verses.verse: בָּעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> At the same time הַהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> will I be the God לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> of all מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <S%H4940><s%> of all the families יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like יִֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֥י לְעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> and they shall be my people ס

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מָצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> found חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> grace בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness עַ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> The people שְׂרִ֣ידֵי <S%H8300><s%> [which were] left חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword הָל֥וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> when I went לְהַרְגִּיע֖וֹ <S%H7280><s%> to cause him to rest יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> [even] Israel

מֵרָח֕וֹק <S%H7350><s%> of old יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD נִרְאָ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> hath appeared לִ֑י וְאַהֲבַ֤ת <S%H160><s%> love עוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> thee with an everlasting אֲהַבְתִּ֔יךְ <S%H157><s%> unto me [saying] Yea I have loved עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that מְשַׁכְתִּ֥יךְ <S%H4900><s%> have I drawn חָֽסֶד׃ <S%H2617><s%> therefore with lovingkindness

ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Again אֶבְנֵךְ֙ <S%H1129><s%> Again I will build וְֽנִבְנֵ֔ית <S%H1129><s%> thee and thou shalt be built בְּתוּלַ֖ת <S%H1330><s%> O virgin יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ע֚וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Again תַּעְדִּ֣י <S%H5710><s%> thou shalt again be adorned תֻפַּ֔יִךְ <S%H8596><s%> with thy tabrets וְיָצָ֖את <S%H3318><s%> and shalt go forth בִּמְח֥וֹל <S%H4234><s%> in the dances מְשַׂחֲקִֽים׃ <S%H7832><s%> of them that make merry

ע֚וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Again תִּטְּעִ֣י <S%H5193><s%> Thou shalt yet plant כְרָמִ֔ים <S%H3754><s%> vines בְּהָרֵ֖י <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains שֹֽׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria נָטְע֥וּ <S%H5193><s%> the planters נֹטְעִ֖ים <S%H5193><s%> shall plant וְחִלֵּֽלוּ׃ <S%H2490><s%> and shall eat [them] as common things

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> For there shall be י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> a day קָרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> shall cry נֹצְרִ֖ים <S%H5341><s%> [that] the watchmen בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> upon the mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim ק֚וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> Arise וְנַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ye and let us go up צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> to Zion אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our God פ

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD רָנּ֤וּ <S%H7442><s%> Sing לְיַֽעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> for Jacob שִׂמְחָ֔ה <S%H8057><s%> with gladness וְצַהֲל֖וּ <S%H6670><s%> and shout בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> among the chief הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> of the nations הַשְׁמִ֤יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> publish הַֽלְלוּ֙ <S%H1984><s%> ye praise וְאִמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> ye and say הוֹשַׁ֤ע <S%H3467><s%> save יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> thy people אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <S%H7611><s%> the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

הִנְנִי֩ <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> Behold I will bring אוֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country צָפ֗וֹן <S%H6828><s%> them from the north וְקִבַּצְתִּים֮ <S%H6908><s%> and gather מִיַּרְכְּתֵי־ <S%H3411><s%> them from the coasts אָרֶץ֒ <S%H776><s%> of the earth בָּ֚ם עִוֵּ֣ר <S%H5787><s%> [and] with them the blind וּפִסֵּ֔חַ <S%H6455><s%> and the lame הָרָ֥ה <S%H2030><s%> the woman with child וְיֹלֶ֖דֶת <S%H3205><s%> and her that travaileth with child יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together קָהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> company גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> a great יָשׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> shall return הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> here

בִּבְכִ֣י <S%H1065><s%> with weeping יָבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> They shall come וּֽבְתַחֲנוּנִים֮ <S%H8469><s%> and with supplications אֽוֹבִילֵם֒ <S%H2986><s%> will I lead אֽוֹלִיכֵם֙ <S%H1980><s%> walk אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> by נַ֣חֲלֵי <S%H5158><s%> by the rivers מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> of waters בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way יָשָׁ֔ר <S%H3477><s%> in a straight לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יִכָּשְׁל֖וּ <S%H3782><s%> wherein they shall not stumble בָּ֑הּ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הָיִ֤יתִי <S%H1961><s%> I am לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> to Israel לְאָ֔ב <S%H1><s%> for I am a father וְאֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> and Ephraim בְּכֹ֥רִי <S%H1060><s%> [is] my firstborn הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he ס

שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> O ye nations וְהַגִּ֥ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> and declare בָאִיִּ֖ים <S%H339><s%> [it] in the isles מִמֶּרְחָ֑ק <S%H4801><s%> afar off וְאִמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> and say מְזָרֵ֤ה <S%H2219><s%> He that scattered יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Israel יְקַבְּצֶ֔נּוּ <S%H6908><s%> will gather וּשְׁמָר֖וֹ <S%H8104><s%> him and keep כְּרֹעֶ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> him as a shepherd עֶדְרֽוֹ׃ <S%H5739><s%> [doth] his flock

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for פָדָ֥ה <S%H6299><s%> hath redeemed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וּגְאָל֕וֹ <S%H1350><s%> and ransomed מִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> him from the hand חָזָ֥ק <S%H2389><s%> of [him that was] stronger מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> than

וּבָאוּ֮ <S%H935><s%> Therefore they shall come וְרִנְּנ֣וּ <S%H7442><s%> and sing בִמְרוֹם־ <S%H4791><s%> in the height צִיּוֹן֒ <S%H6726><s%> of Zion וְנָהֲר֞וּ <S%H5102><s%> and shall flow together אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over ט֣וּב <S%H2898><s%> to the goodness יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over דָּגָן֙ <S%H1715><s%> for wheat וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over תִּירֹ֣שׁ <S%H8492><s%> and for wine וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over יִצְהָ֔ר <S%H3323><s%> and for oil וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and for the young צֹ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> of the flock וּבָקָ֑ר <S%H1241><s%> and of the herd וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become נַפְשָׁם֙ <S%H5315><s%> and their soul כְּגַ֣ן <S%H1588><s%> garden רָוֶ֔ה <S%H7302><s%> shall be as a watered וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוֹסִ֥יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> any more לְדַאֲבָ֖ה <S%H1669><s%> and they shall not sorrow עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> again

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then תִּשְׂמַ֤ח <S%H8055><s%> rejoice בְּתוּלָה֙ <S%H1330><s%> Then shall the virgin בְּמָח֔וֹל <S%H4234><s%> in the dance וּבַחֻרִ֥ים <S%H970><s%> both young men וּזְקֵנִ֖ים <S%H2205><s%> and old יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together וְהָפַכְתִּ֨י <S%H2015><s%> for I will turn אֶבְלָ֤ם <S%H60><s%> their mourning לְשָׂשׂוֹן֙ <S%H8342><s%> into joy וְנִ֣חַמְתִּ֔ים <S%H5162><s%> and will comfort וְשִׂמַּחְתִּ֖ים <S%H8055><s%> them and make them rejoice מִיגוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H3015><s%> from their sorrow

וְרִוֵּיתִ֛י <S%H7301><s%> And I will satiate נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the soul הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests דָּ֑שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> with fatness וְעַמִּ֛י <S%H5971><s%> and my people אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with טוּבִ֥י <S%H2898><s%> with my goodness יִשְׂבָּ֖עוּ <S%H7646><s%> shall be satisfied נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> A voice בְּרָמָ֤ה <S%H7414><s%> in Ramah נִשְׁמָע֙ <S%H8085><s%> was heard נְהִי֙ <S%H5092><s%> lamentation בְּכִ֣י <S%H1065><s%> weeping תַמְרוּרִ֔ים <S%H8563><s%> [and] bitter רָחֵ֖ל <S%H7354><s%> Rahel מְבַכָּ֣ה <S%H1058><s%> weeping עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for בָּנֶ֑יהָ <S%H1121><s%> for her children מֵאֲנָ֛ה <S%H3985><s%> refused לְהִנָּחֵ֥ם <S%H5162><s%> to be comforted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for בָּנֶ֖יהָ <S%H1121><s%> for her children כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because אֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H369><s%> are no ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מִנְעִ֤י <S%H4513><s%> Refrain קוֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H6963><s%> thy voice מִבֶּ֔כִי <S%H1065><s%> from weeping וְעֵינַ֖יִךְ <S%H5869><s%> and thine eyes מִדִּמְעָ֑ה <S%H1832><s%> from tears כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for יֵ֨שׁ <S%H3426><s%> shall be שָׂכָ֤ר <S%H7939><s%> rewarded לִפְעֻלָּתֵךְ֙ <S%H6468><s%> for thy work נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְשָׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> and they shall come again מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the land אוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> of the enemy

וְיֵשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> And there is תִּקְוָ֥ה <S%H8615><s%> hope לְאַחֲרִיתֵ֖ךְ <S%H319><s%> in thine end נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְשָׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> shall come again בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> that thy children לִגְבוּלָֽם׃ <S%H1366><s%> to their own border ס

שָׁמ֣וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> I have surely שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> heard אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> Ephraim מִתְנוֹדֵ֔ד <S%H5110><s%> bemoaning יִסַּרְתַּ֙נִי֙ <S%H3256><s%> himself [thus] Thou hast chastised וָֽאִוָּסֵ֔ר <S%H3256><s%> me and I was chastised כְּעֵ֖גֶל <S%H5695><s%> as a bullock לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not לֻמָּ֑ד <S%H3925><s%> to teach הֲשִׁיבֵ֣נִי <S%H7725><s%> [to the yoke] turn וְאָשׁ֔וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> thou me and I shall be turned כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> You יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for thou [art] the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> my God

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because אַחֲרֵ֤י <S%H310><s%> Surely after שׁוּבִי֙ <S%H7725><s%> that I was turned נִחַ֔מְתִּי <S%H5162><s%> I repented וְאַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> and after הִוָּ֣דְעִ֔י <S%H3045><s%> that I was instructed סָפַ֖קְתִּי <S%H5606><s%> I smote עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יָרֵ֑ךְ <S%H3409><s%> upon [my] thigh בֹּ֚שְׁתִּי <S%H954><s%> I was ashamed וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also נִכְלַ֔מְתִּי <S%H3637><s%> yea even confounded כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because נָשָׂ֖אתִי <S%H5375><s%> because I did bear חֶרְפַּ֥ת <S%H2781><s%> the reproach נְעוּרָֽי׃ <S%H5271><s%> of my youth

הֲבֵן֩ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted יַקִּ֨יר <S%H3357><s%> my dear לִ֜י אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> [Is] Ephraim אִ֚ם <S%H518><s%> lo יֶ֣לֶד <S%H3206><s%> boy שַׁעֲשֻׁעִ֔ים <S%H8191><s%> delight כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> as מִדֵּ֤י <S%H1767><s%> often דַבְּרִי֙ <S%H1696><s%> I spake בּ֔וֹ זָכֹ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> against him I do earnestly אֶזְכְּרֶ֖נּוּ <S%H2142><s%> remember ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that הָמ֤וּ <S%H1993><s%> are troubled מֵעַי֙ <S%H4578><s%> him still therefore my bowels ל֔וֹ רַחֵ֥ם <S%H7355><s%> for him I will surely אֲ‍ֽרַחֲמֶ֖נּוּ <S%H7355><s%> have mercy נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> upon him saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

הַצִּ֧יבִי <S%H5324><s%> Set thee up לָ֣ךְ צִיֻּנִ֗ים <S%H6725><s%> waymarks שִׂ֤מִי <S%H7760><s%> make לָךְ֙ תַּמְרוּרִ֔ים <S%H8564><s%> thee high heaps שִׁ֣תִי <S%H7896><s%> set לִבֵּ֔ךְ <S%H3820><s%> thine heart לַֽמְסִלָּ֖ה <S%H4546><s%> toward the highway דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [even] the way [הָלָכְתִּי כ] (הָלָ֑כְתְּ <S%H1980><s%> along ק) שׁ֚וּבִי <S%H7725><s%> turn again בְּתוּלַ֣ת <S%H1330><s%> O virgin יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שֻׁ֖בִי <S%H7725><s%> turn again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עָרַ֥יִךְ <S%H5892><s%> to these thy cities אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> to these

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and the whole הָעֵ֣מֶק <S%H6010><s%> And the whole valley הַפְּגָרִ֣ים ׀ <S%H6297><s%> of the dead bodies וְהַדֶּ֡שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> and of the ashes וְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all [הַשְּׁרֵמֹות כ] (הַשְּׁדֵמֹות֩ <S%H8309><s%> field ק) עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far נַ֨חַל <S%H5158><s%> unto the brook קִדְר֜וֹן <S%H6939><s%> of Kidron עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far פִּנַּ֨ת <S%H6438><s%> unto the corner שַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַסּוּסִים֙ <S%H5483><s%> of the horse מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> toward the east קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [shall be] holy לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִנָּתֵ֧שׁ <S%H5428><s%> it shall not be plucked up וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> or יֵהָרֵ֛ס <S%H2040><s%> nor thrown down ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> anymore לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> any more for ever ס
